```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load Libraries and Data

```{r load-data}
# Load necessary libraries
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

# Load the dataset
whale_data <- read_csv("your_dataset.csv")
```

## Data Cleaning

### Normalize Columns

```{r clean-data}
# Convert 'Channel' and 'Source' columns to lowercase
whale_data <- whale_data %>%
  mutate(Channel = tolower(Channel),
         Source = tolower(Source))

# Handle missing values
whale_data <- whale_data %>%
  mutate(Count = ifelse(is.na(Count), 1, Count),
         Source = ifelse(is.na(Source), "unknown", Source))
```

## Add Month Column

```{r add-month}
# Convert SightDate to date format and extract the month
whale_data <- whale_data %>%
  mutate(SightDate = as.Date(SightDate, format = "%m/%d/%y"),
         Month = format(SightDate, "%m"))
```

## Exploratory Statistics

### Total Whale Count

```{r total-count}
total_count <- sum(whale_data$Count, na.rm = TRUE)
print(paste("Total Whale Count:", total_count))
```

### Monthly Whale Counts

```{r monthly-counts}
monthly_counts <- whale_data %>%
  group_by(Month) %>%
  summarise(TotalCount = sum(Count, na.rm = TRUE))

print(monthly_counts)
```

### Whale Counts by Quad

```{r quad-counts}
quad_counts <- whale_data %>%
  group_by(Quad) %>%
  summarise(TotalCount = sum(Count, na.rm = TRUE))

print(quad_counts)
```

### Channel and Source Summaries

```{r channel-source-summary}
channel_summary <- whale_data %>%
  count(Channel)

source_summary <- whale_data %>%
  count(Source)

print(channel_summary)
print(source_summary)
```

## Save Cleaned Data (Optional)

```{r save-cleaned}
# Write cleaned data to a new file
write_csv(whale_data, "cleaned_whale_data.csv")
```
